meta.description: Determine the minimum travel cost for a salesperson to visit each of four cities exactly once and return to the starting city.

sets.name: CITIES
sets.description: The set of cities the salesperson must visit.

params.name: travel_cost
params.description: The travel cost between each pair of cities.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if the route includes travel from one city to another.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(travel_cost[i][j] * x[i][j] for i in CITIES for j in CITIES)
objective.description: Minimize the total travel cost of the route.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_City 1
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['City 1'][j] for j in CITIES if j != 'City 1')
constraints.description: Ensure City 1 is visited exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_City 2
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['City 2'][j] for j in CITIES if j != 'City 2')
constraints.description: Ensure City 2 is visited exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_City 3
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['City 3'][j] for j in CITIES if j != 'City 3')
constraints.description: Ensure City 3 is visited exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_City 4
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['City 4'][j] for j in CITIES if j != 'City 4')
constraints.description: Ensure City 4 is visited exactly once.

constraints.name: leave_each_city_once_City 1
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['City 1'] for i in CITIES if i != 'City 1')
constraints.description: Ensure the route leaves City 1 exactly once.

constraints.name: leave_each_city_once_City 2
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['City 2'] for i in CITIES if i != 'City 2')
constraints.description: Ensure the route leaves City 2 exactly once.

constraints.name: leave_each_city_once_City 3
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['City 3'] for i in CITIES if i != 'City 3')
constraints.description: Ensure the route leaves City 3 exactly once.

constraints.name: leave_each_city_once_City 4
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['City 4'] for i in CITIES if i != 'City 4')
constraints.description: Ensure the route leaves City 4 exactly once.
